title: MCP Discovery Config Entry
description: Schema for a single MCP server entry in a discovery ConfigMap.

url.description: A url through which a connection to the MCP server instance can be established. This should be the full url including any path as required by the transport in use.

transport.description: The transport to use: streaming or sse. If not specified streaming is assumed.

logo.description: A url to a logo for the server.
